trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> Web controlo de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control represents a data source that calls methods of a business object in order to perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo representa uma origem de dados que chama os métodos de um objecto de negócio para efetuar as operações Delete, Insert, selecione e atualização da base de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe de ObjectDataSourceDesigner fornece suporte de momento da conceção para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo de um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceDesigner class members provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property indicates whether the Configure Data Source wizard can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Os membros de classe ObjectDataSourceDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>propriedade indica se o Assistente para configurar a origem de dados pode ser apresentado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property indicates whether the schema of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can be refreshed at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>propriedade indica se o esquema de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo pode ser atualizado no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property specifies the method that performs the Select function.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>propriedade especifica o método que executa a função selecione.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property specifies the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>propriedade especifica o tipo de objecto de negócio que fornece os dados para o controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>método devolve uma vista de origem de dados com o nome especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a list of data source view names for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>método devolve uma lista de nomes de vista de origem de dados para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method extracts the metadata for the Select method from the associated business object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>método extrai os metadados para o método Select do objeto de empresas associadas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method causes the Configure Data Source wizard to be displayed on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>método faz com que o Assistente para configurar a origem de dados para serem apresentados na superfície do designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method removes properties from, adds additional properties to, or shadows properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método Remove propriedades a partir do, adiciona propriedades adicionais para ou funciona como sombra propriedades do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo ou uma cópia desse controlo na superfície do designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method can be called, and the CanConfigure property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>método pode ser chamado, não sendo a propriedade CanConfigure `true`, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>propriedade associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo implementa um o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanConfigure is `true`, the **Configure Data Source** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a CanConfigure `true`, a **configurar origem de dados** item de menu é apresentado no **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu de contexto do controlo associado na superfície do designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The Configure Data Source wizard is invoked when this menu item is selected.
trans-unit.target: O Assistente para configurar a origem de dados é invocada quando este item de menu é seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se é possível chamar o método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method can be called, and the CanRefreshSchema property is `true`, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control implements either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties both contain a value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>método pode ser chamado, não sendo a propriedade CanRefreshSchema `true`, se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>propriedade associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo implementa um o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>interface e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>ambas as propriedades de conter um valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the CanRefreshSchema is `true`, the **Refresh Schema** menu item is displayed in the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a CanRefreshSchema `true`, a **atualizar esquema** item de menu é apresentado no **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu de contexto do controlo associado na superfície do designer visual.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Displays the Configure Data Source wizard on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Mostra o Assistente para configurar a origem de dados na superfície do designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method initiates a transaction that causes the Configure Data Source wizard to appear on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O método de configurar inicia uma transação que faz com que o Assistente de origem de dados de configurar aparecer na superfície do designer visual.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is called when you select the **Configure Data Source** menu item on the **Common ObjectDataSource Tasks** context menu of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de configuração é chamado quando seleciona o **configurar origem de dados** item de menu no **tarefas comuns de ObjectDataSource** menu de contexto de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The **Configure Data Source** menu item appears on the context menu when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O **configurar origem de dados** item de menu é apresentado no menu de contexto quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a data source view with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma vista de origem de dados com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The GetView method returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: O método GetView devolve um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>objeto com o nome especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: If `viewName` is `null` or an empty string (""), the first view name in the array of names that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> is used as the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Se `viewName` é `null` ou uma cadeia vazia (""), o primeiro nome de vista na matriz de nomes que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>é utilizado como o nome especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view names are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>, GetView generates an unnamed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: Se não existem nomes de vista são devolvidos pela <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>GetView gera um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView> sem nome</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o nome do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An with the name specified by viewName.
trans-unit.target: Um com o nome especificado pelo viewName .

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of data source view names for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma lista de nomes de vista de origem de dados para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The GetViewNames method gets the view names from the names of the schema data tables of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetViewNames obtém os nomes de vista dos nomes das tabelas de dados de esquema do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> objects of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de cadeia que contém os nomes do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objetos associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado pelo estruturador para remover propriedades de ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para apresentar no **propriedades** grelha ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers controlo utilizam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para funcionar como sombra várias propriedades de controlo com propriedades correspondentes do tempo de criação que implementa o estruturador, e para adicionar propriedades ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grelha.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control so that they appear in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O método PreFilterProperties cria propriedades do momento da conceção para sombra o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>Propriedades de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlar de modo a que aparecem no **propriedades** grelha do visual designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementar uma coleção a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Extracts the metadata for the Select method from the business object that is specified by the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Extrai os metadados para o método Select de objecto de negócio que é especificado pelo controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method extracts the metadata for the method that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A> property from the <xref:System.Type> object that is named by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> property, which is the type of the business object that provides the data for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RefreshSchema extrai os metadados para o método que é designado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Type>objeto que é designado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A>propriedade, o que é o tipo de objecto de negócio que fornece os dados para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: The metadata is saved in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> array and in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> array of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Os metadados é guardado num <xref:System.Data.DataTable>matriz e no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A>matriz do designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.DesignerState%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, does not display error messages when exceptions occur during processing; otherwise, exception messages are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, não apresentar mensagens de erro quando ocorrem exceções durante o processamento; caso contrário, são apresentadas mensagens de exceção.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> method of the associated control is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do método a executar quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>método do controlo associado é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The SelectMethod property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Sombras de propriedade SelectMethod o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>propriedade do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the SelectMethod property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade SelectMethod é alterado, a marcação de momento da conceção para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo é atualizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>se chama o método, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>propriedade é true; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the method to execute when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o nome do método a executar quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>é chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type that contains the methods that are specified in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do tipo que contém os métodos especificados no controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The TypeName property shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Sombras de propriedade TypeName o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>propriedade do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the TypeName property is changed, the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade TypeName é alterado, a marcação de momento da conceção para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlo é atualizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method is called, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is true; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>se chama o método, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A>propriedade é true; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the type that contains the methods that perform the Delete, Insert, Select, and Update database operations specified in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia contendo o nome do tipo que contém os métodos que executam o Delete, Insert, selecione e atualização de base de dados operações especificadas no associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>.
